query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Tant’ eran li occhi miei fissi e attenti 2 a disbramarsi la decenne sete, 3 che li altri sensi m’eran tutti spenti.
query.error: **English:** 1 So fixed and intent were my eyes 2 on satisfying their thirst for the pleasant sight, 3 that all my other senses were extinguished.
query.result: 1 Begitu tajam pandangan mataku dan penuh perhatian 2 untuk memuaskan dahaga akan pemandangan yang menyenangkan, 3 sehingga semua inderaku yang lain padam.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 Ed essi quinci e quindi avien parete 5 di non caler—così lo santo riso 6 a sé traéli con l’antica rete!—;
query.error: **English:** 4 And they on this side and that had a wall 5 of not falling—thus the holy laughter 6 drew them to itself with the ancient net!—;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 quando per forza mi fu vòlto il viso 8 ver’ la sinistra mia da quelle dee, 9 perch’ io udi’ da loro un «Troppo fiso!»;
query.error: **English:** 7 when by force my face was turned 8 toward my left by those goddesses, 9 because I heard from them a “Too fixedly!”;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 e la disposizion ch’a veder èe 11 ne li occhi pur testé dal sol percossi, 12 sanza la vista alquanto esser mi fée.
query.error: **English:** 10 and the disposition that is seen 11 in the eyes just now struck by the sun, 12 made me somewhat lose my sight.
query.result: 10 dan watak yang terlihat 11 di mata yang baru saja disinari matahari, 12 membuatku agak kehilangan penglihatan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 Ma poi ch’al poco il viso riformossi 14 (e dico ‘al poco’ per rispetto al molto 15 sensibile onde a forza mi rimossi),

query.result: 13 Tetapi kemudian, ketika penglihatanku agak pulih 14 (dan kukatakan “agak” dibandingkan dengan cahaya yang sangat terang 15 yang memaksaku untuk berpaling),

query.prompt:

query.result: 16 kulihat di lengan kananku pasukan yang mulia itu 17 berputar-putar, dan kembali 18 dengan matahari dan tujuh nyala api di depan mereka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 quella milizia del celeste regno 23 che procedeva, tutta trapassonne 24 pria che piegasse il carro il primo legno.
query.error: **English:** 22 that soldiery of the celestial kingdom 23 which was advancing, passed all through 24 before the chariot had turned the first timber.
query.result: 22 pasukan kerajaan surgawi itu 23 yang maju, semuanya telah lewat 24 sebelum kereta perang memutar kayu pertama.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 Indi a le rote si tornar le donne, 26 e ’l grifon mosse il benedetto carco 27 sì, che però nulla penna crollonne.
query.error: **English:** 25 Then the ladies turned to the wheels, 26 and the griffin moved the blessed burden 27 so that not a single feather shook.
query.result: 25 Kemudian para wanita itu kembali ke roda, 26 dan griffin itu menggerakkan beban yang diberkati itu 27 sehingga tidak sehelai bulu pun yang bergetar.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 La bella donna che mi trasse al varco 29 e Stazio e io seguitavam la rota 30 che fé l’orbita sua con minore arco.
query.error: **English:** 28 The beautiful lady who led me to the pass, 29 and Statius and I followed the path 30 that made its orbit with a smaller arc.
query.result: 28 Wanita cantik yang membawaku ke celah gunung 29 dan Statius dan aku mengikuti jalan 30 yang membuat orbitnya dengan lengkungan yang lebih kecil.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 Sì passeggiando l’alta selva vòta, 32 colpa di quella ch’al serpente crese, 33 temprava i passi un’angelica nota.
query.error: **English:** 31 Thus, wandering through the deep forest, 32 the fault of her who trusted the serpent, 33 an angelic voice moderated my steps.
query.result: 31 Demikianlah, mengembara melalui hutan lebat, 32 kesalahan dia yang mempercayai ular, 33 suara malaikat memoderasi langkahku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.result: 34 Mungkin dalam tiga kali terbang anak panah 35 kilat yang tak terkendali meliputi ruang sebanyak itu 36 sejauh kami disingkirkan, ketika Beatrice turun.

query.prompt:

query.error: **English:** 40 Its crown, which spreads out so much 41 the higher it is, would be admired in the Indies 42 for its height in their forests.
query.result: 40 Mahkotanya, yang begitu melebar 41 semakin tinggi semakin melebar, akan dikagumi di Hindia 42 karena ketinggiannya di hutan-hutan mereka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
43 «Beato se’, grifon, che non discindi 44 col becco d’esto legno dolce al gusto, 45 poscia che mal si torce il ventre quindi».
query.error: **English:** 43 "Blessed are you, griffin, that do not descend 44 with your beak from this wood that is sweet to the taste, 45 since the belly is then twisted badly from it."
query.result: 43 "Berbahagialah kamu, griffin, yang tidak turun 44 dengan paruhmu dari kayu ini yang manis rasanya, 45 karena perut akan sangat menderita karenanya."

query.prompt:

query.result: 46 Demikianlah di sekeliling pohon yang kokoh 47 yang lain-lain berseru; dan binatang berwujud dua: 48 "Ya, demikianlah terpelihara benih setiap orang yang adil."

query.prompt:
